subpod.title: Best picture
subpod.plaintext: winner | Forrest Gump (produced by Wendy Finerman, Steve Tisch and Steve Starkey) nominees | Four Weddings and a Funeral (produced by Duncan Kenworthy) | Pulp Fiction (produced by Lawrence Bender) | Quiz Show (produced by Robert Redford, Michael Jacobs, Julian Krainin and Michael Nozik) | The Shawshank Redemption (produced by Niki Marvin)

subpod.plaintext: winner | Tom Hanks in Forrest Gump nominees | John Travolta in Pulp Fiction | Morgan Freeman in The Shawshank Redemption | Nigel Hawthorne in The Madness of King George | Paul Newman in Nobody's Fool
